title: Our Menu
subtitle: Seasonal dishes crafted with local ingredients.

items.title: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Atlantic salmon with herb butter, seasonal vegetables
items.details: Our signature grilled salmon is sourced from sustainable Atlantic fisheries. Served with herb butter, roasted seasonal vegetables, and a lemon-dill sauce. Gluten-free option available.

items.title: Beef Tenderloin
items.description: 8oz grass-fed beef, truffle mashed potatoes, red wine reduction
items.details: Premium 8oz grass-fed beef tenderloin, cooked to your preference. Accompanied by truffle mashed potatoes and a rich red wine reduction. Served with seasonal greens.

items.title: Caesar Salad
items.details: Classic Caesar with crisp romaine, shaved parmesan, house-made dressing, and garlic croutons. Add grilled chicken or salmon for an extra charge.

items.title: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with espresso and mascarpone
items.details: Traditional Italian tiramisu layered with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream. Dusted with cocoa. Made fresh daily.

items.title: Craft Old Fashioned
items.details: Our house Old Fashioned: premium bourbon, aromatic bitters, muddled orange and cherry. Served over a large ice sphere. Available with rye upon request.

items.title: Seasonal Soup
items.details: Chef's selection changes daily. Recent offerings include butternut squash, tomato basil, and mushroom bisque. Ask your server for today's selection.
